channel.title: Growth Operating System
channel.description: Recent content on Growth Operating System

item.title: Course outline
item.description: What do we cover during the Growth OS workshop? Introduction to Growth What is growth? Sustainable growth versus fake growth Growth Discipline North star metric The metric that tells you if you are growing The pirate metric framework AARRR metrics How you can measure acquisition, activation, retention, referrals, revenue How to measure growth accurately Other growth measures Understanding the long term relationship that you have with your customers Measuring churn and customer lifetime value Funnel analysis Network effects Virality Product market fit Are you growing sustainably?

item.title: Contact
item.description: Contact We want to help you grow. If you're interested in finding out more about our course, or there are other ways that we can help you grow, get in touch with us by sending an email to yara@growth-OS.com. Contact Us
